name: Toy Box Brawl
description:
Jump into to the world of Toy Box Brawl, a Free to play solo minigames collection with the capacity of having your toys in your desktop while you do other stuff! And keep playing!

Toy Box Brawl gathers several fictional toy companies with their main toy assets for you to collect and play with them.

On this Alpha 1.0 version you will find more than 20 toys and 2 casual solo mini games, but more will come soon...

Platform mode: Select your favorite toy and fight your way out against waves and waves of several characters in a platform stage, to gain the biggest reward possible, so you can later change them for tickets in order to get more characters.

Runner mode: Jump and travel your way out of this mayhem, get the biggest score possible and claim your reward.


This is our Alpha version and our main goal is to know about what minigames you like, to have them all in here, our list is in process now with the following and soon will be release, so help us out!

• 1v1 brawl
• Strategy Tactics
• Puzzles
• Tabletop games
• And more…

Our final step is the creation of the “Room” so you can customize your toy room with several objects that you will win playing all of our mini games.
So, jump into the world of Toy Box Brawl and help us making this big dream come true, play it, grind it and collect all our toys.
